title: How to Cook Meat in Minecraft

steps.title: Obtain some meat from an animal (pig, sheep, chicken, or cow).
steps.content: Obtain some meat from an animal (pig, sheep, chicken, or cow).

steps.title: Make a pickaxe and mine some cobblestone.
steps.content: Make a pickaxe and mine some cobblestone. Harvest some wood and craft a crafting table.

steps.title: Tap on the crafting table.
steps.content: Tap on the crafting table. Use the cobblestone to make a furnace.

steps.title: Use your pickaxe to mine some coal or make some charcoal out of wood.
steps.content: Use your pickaxe to mine some coal or make some charcoal out of wood.

steps.title: Put the coal and the meat (pork, chicken, or beef) in the furnace.
steps.content: Put the coal and the meat (pork, chicken, or beef) in the furnace. Wait until the arrow on the side of the screen is full. That means the meat is cooked.

steps.title: Put the cooked meat in your inventory.
steps.content: Put the cooked meat in your inventory.
